script.source:
zypper -n mr --priority=99 'openSUSE_13.1_OSS' --name='openSUSE_13.1_OSS' --refresh zypper -n ar --name='openSUSE_13.1_NON_OSS' --type='yast2' --disable 'http://download.opensuse.org/distribution/13.1/repo/non-oss/' 'openSUSE_13.1_NON_OSS_ALIAS' zypper -n mr --priority=99 'openSUSE_13.1_NON_OSS_ALIAS' --name='openSUSE_13.1_NON_OSS' --no-refresh mkdir -p '/mnt/etc' curl -o '/mnt/etc/cron tab' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/config_files/etc/cron%20tab" chown root:root '/mnt/etc/cron tab' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/cron tab' mkdir -p '/mnt/etc/cron.daily' curl -o '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/md adm' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/changed_managed_files/etc/cron.daily/md%20adm" chown root:root '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/md adm' chmod 644 '/mnt/etc/cron.daily/md adm' curl -o '/mnt/tmp/filter' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files_build_excludes"
curl -o '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files/etc/tarball%20with%20spaces.tgz" tar -C /mnt/ -X '/mnt/tmp/filter' -xf '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz' rm '/mnt/tmp/tarball with spaces.tgz'
curl -o '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz' "`cat /tmp/description_url`/unmanaged_files/files.tgz" tar -C /mnt/ -X '/mnt/tmp/filter' -xf '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz' rm '/mnt/tmp/files.tgz'
